gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Region
Class WCRegion

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Region.WCRegion
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WCRegion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class groups together the selected region and the bounding world coordinate points of this region. The selected region type is a string that is specified in the SelectionJPanel.java. Use those static variables to specify this type. This class is also used to pass region information from the Selection Overlay to the view component. The Region class in the Region directory is used to pass region info from the view component to the viewer.

See Also:

public java.lang.String getRegionType()

getWorldCoordPointAt

public floatPoint2D getWorldCoordPointAt(int index)
Get the world coordinate point at the index specified. The index of the first element is 0. If the index exceeds the size of the array, the last element will be returned.

Parameters:
index -
Returns:
wcp - floatPoint2D point at index

getWorldCoordPoints
